message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $95. I believe it's a fair price considering its value.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer.  $95 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable paying.  How about $85?  That seems like a fair price for both of us.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I can't go lower than $90. This product is worth a lot to me, and I believe it will be highly valuable to you as well.
Alice, I understand your position.  I'm willing to go up to $88. That's my absolute maximum, and I'm sure we can both find this to be a fair deal.
